GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.10.166
GSD.description:
ipv4: prevent potential spectre v1 gadget in ip_metrics_convert()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.166 by commit 34c6142f0df9cd75cba5a7aa9df0960d2854b415, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 6cf9dfd3bd62edfff69f11c0f111bc261166e4c7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ipv4: prevent potential spectre v1 gadget in ip_metrics_convert()
